text: The 2010–11 Liga IV Teleorman was the 43rd season of the Liga IV Teleorman, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 29 August 2010 and ended on 4 June 2011. Viață Nouă Olteni was crowned as county champion == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Teleorman=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Teleorman * Metalul Frăsinet * CSȘ Alexandria * Manov * Unirea Cosmești ===From Liga IV Teleorman=== Promoted to Liga III * Dunărea Turris Turnu Măgurele Relegated to Liga V Teleorman * Beirut Siliștea * Iorom Moșteni ===Other changes=== * Steaua Spătărei was spared from relegation. * Tineretul Crevenicu withdrew from Liga IV. ==League table== ==Promotion play- off== Champions of Liga IV – Teleorman County face champions of Liga IV – Ilfov County. |} Lindab Ștefănești promoted to 2011–12 Liga III. ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2010–11 Liga I * 2010–11 Liga II * 2010–11 Liga III ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2010–11 Liga IV Alba * 2010–11 Liga IV Arad * 2010–11 Liga IV Prahova * 2010–11 Liga IV Suceava ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Teleorman County
title: 2010–11 Liga IV Teleorman
